title: In case where Principal and Ancillary users are not reflected in the above table but are compatible to the reservation development, such uses shall be permissible with the special permission of the Commissioner
clause_text: In case where Principal and Ancillary users are not reflected in the above table but are compatible to the reservation development, such uses shall be permissible with the special permission of the Commissioner.
